sentences.english: I have carefully read and agreed to all terms and conditions of JZ School.
sentences.chinese: 本人已认真阅读并接受学校的各项条款及规章制度。

sentences.english: Yeah, Hospital regs . You can't date patients, right?
sentences.chinese: 对，医院规章，不能约会病人，对吧？

sentences.english: Improved management of the cadre and personnel files of the rules and regulations.
sentences.chinese: 完善了有关干部人事档案管理的各项规章制度。

sentences.english: He was chided by the superior because he had violated the company's bylaws.
sentences.chinese: 他因违反公司的规章制度遭到上级的挥斥。

sentences.english: The convocation held at four oclock had passed regulation.
sentences.chinese: 四点举行的会议通过了一项规章制度。

sentences.english: Mr Schapiro is a campaigner for tougher regulation of American business.
sentences.chinese: 斯加皮罗极力推行美国商业使用更为严厉的规章制度。

sentences.english: "The key is to pursue full implementation of these regulations, " she said.
sentences.chinese: “关键在于使这些规章制度能全力贯彻落实，”她说。

sentences.english: Laws and regulations on the control of such chemicals have gradually been perfected.
sentences.chinese: 不断健全管制易制毒化学品的法规和规章。

sentences.english: The other day, my friends and I talked about the rules that we have in school. (P22)
sentences.chinese: 那天，我和我的朋友们谈论我们学校的各种规章制度。

sentences.english: Perform the finance management locally according to the rules and policy of the company.
sentences.chinese: 根据公司的规章和政策进行本地的财政管理。

sentences.english: We just received the new dress code for my sixth-grader.
sentences.chinese: 我六年级的儿子刚发了学校着装规章。

sentences.english: These regulations refer to every foreigner.
sentences.chinese: 这些规章适用于一切外国人。

sentences.english: Everyone must obey the regulations of the dance studio.
sentences.chinese: 每位必需遵守舞蹈室规章制度。

sentences.english: This case can be dealt' with within' the frame'work of the exis'ting.
sentences.chinese: 这一情况可以在现行的规章制度内加以处理。

sentences.english: The following summaries offer a snapshot of current regulations these US-based organizations are addressing.
sentences.chinese: 下面简要给出当前基于美国的规章。

definition: provision/to fix/to set/to formulate/to stipulate/to provide/regulation/rule/CL:個|个[ge4]
to comply with/to abide by/to respect (an agreement)
rules/regulations/constitution/statute/articles of association (of company)/articles of incorporation/charter (of a corporation)/by-laws
norm/standard/specification/regulation/rule/within the rules/to fix rules/to regulate/to specify
